sections.heading: Ejectment; occupying claimants; rights
sections.text: The parties in an action for the recovery of property may avail themselves, if entitled thereto, of the relief provided for in sections 76-301 to 76-311 for occupying claimants.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 632, p. 506;R.S.1913, ยง 8234;C.S.1922, ยง 9196;C.S.1929, ยง 20-
